text:
Hi .
Some of my users who have hs membership when they log out they see the version of the site from logged in , need a refresh to see it correctly .
Sometimes it happens sometimes not , is this HubSpot problem?

Hey everyone, I was referred here by a sales support member from live chat.

Is there a way to set the error messages not to create an additional gap/space when they appear? I'm using a top margin to create the spacing between fields vertically, when the error message appears -  it adds additional space, instead of just appearing there (it has sufficient space)
Switched to v1 verification for now

The example from the <https://53.HubSpotpreview-na1.com/_hcms/preview/content/29865107554/version/73915396710?portalId=53&revisionPreview=true&_preview=true|docs> (which has a typo) isnâ€™t working either.

Hi <@U03HFR2M36E>

I can suggest more better if you will confirm. Which kind of website are you gonna build?

Is it transactional or non?

Hi, quick question,
I built an APi, connected it to HubSpot, and right now when i try to add settings to the app (HubSpot side) The changes won't save and the deploy button isn't working.
I can click on both, but when exiting, it warns me about leaving with unsaved changes, and if I insist on leaving, none of the changes (or even the default placeholder) are saved. Am I forgetting an essential part? Thanks for your help everyone!
most likely a CSS cause, would need a live link to help further

Does anyone has a login here?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/theme-accelerator-program|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/theme-accelerator-program>
it was for the old program
